EnglishPhrase: Hold if systolic blood pressure (top number) is lower than 150.

EnglishPhrase: Use the medicine for 3 weeks and then stop using the medicine for 1 week. Repeat this cycle every month.

QM_TranslatedPhrase: Take medications for 3 weeks and do not take medication for 1 week. Do this every month.

EnglishPhrase: Sit or stand for 1 hour after taking the medicine. Do not lie down.

EnglishPhrase: Contact your doctor if your symptoms do not begin to improve after 2 days on this medicine.

QM_TranslatedPhrase: After 2 days you have been using these medications for non-hormonal symptoms, contact your doctor.

EnglishPhrase: Change the location of the medicine in the mouth with each dose to avoid irritation.

EnglishPhrase: It is very important that you use your medicine every day and that you do not miss any dose of your insulin. Have a discussion with your doctor about what you should do in case you miss an insulin dose.
PhraseDesc: Yeej tseem ceeb heev rau koj siv koj cov tshuaj txhua hnub tsis qhaj ib qho tshuaj "insulin" li. Nrog koj tus kws kho mob tham seb yuav tsum ua licas yog koj qhaj ib qho tshuaj "insulin".
